description: Configuration for running the local ridge regression pipeline (LocalRidgeRunner).

prices_path.description: CSV of monthly prices (index=dates, cols=tickers) used to compute returns and distances

basis_path.description: Path to the basis list CSV (one-column 'basis' or timeseries). The runner will filter this list to available tickers.

ridge_alpha.description: Ridge regularization strength (alpha) passed to sklearn.linear_model.Ridge

q_neighbors.description: Optional maximum number of basis neighbors used as regressors per asset. If null, all available basis are considered.

min_periods.description: Minimum overlapping observations required when computing pairwise correlations/distances

corr_method.description: Correlation method used for distance computation ('pearson' or 'spearman')

shrink_method.description: Optional covariance shrinkage/denoising method (e.g. 'lw' or 'pca'). If null, no shrinkage applied.

pca_n_components.description: When using PCA denoising, number of components to keep (null to infer by explained variance)

pca_explained_variance.description: When using PCA denoising, fraction of explained variance to retain (0-1). If set, `pca_n_components` may be null.
